body:
Hey guys,

So I went on Avi the other day, and there were about 50-100 people online. I then found everyone on DTM playing a map. Then I found out it was full, and it wouldn't free up soon. So I left to play another server.

I know heaps of people who do that, and find out that the only game mode that is played is DTM. To be honest, I've been playing less Avicus, because everyone is always playing DTM! I used to love it, but it's getting a bit boring now. So…

Let's Promote Other Gamemodes!

What about some of the games which aren't played as much, such as Elimination, SG and CTH to have a bonus credits (maybe something like double credits weekend for these game modes) so more people will play them?

Suggest other ways below!
